name: Walk (703337)
description:
Walk is (currently) a walking simulator. It has an incomplete story, and doesn't have much to do at the moment, but it is still very new, so this may all change.

Walk is the sequel to my game Through the static, which was a Scratch game I made for the 2019 Scratch Jam, and was the sequel to my first Scratch game I ever made, Water Game. I only decided that this would be a sequel after playing my old Scratch games again, and saw that I was making a story, which had ended with a 'To be Continued...'. If you want to play Water Game or Through the static, search for the user DXA06 on Scratch. Through the static can also be downloaded from Itch.io.

The Mac and Linux versions of Walk are not tested, and may not work properly. Currently there is no controller support, but might add it sometime in the future.
